Detailed Description

The SaveLoad class that deals with saving and loading a player's inventory (items/events/actions), current location, and game time

Member Function Documentation

Loads the inventory, saved area the player was in (text file), and time

Parameters:
inventory A reference to the inventory.
currentArea A string for the next area/textfile to be loaded

Member Data Documentation

string SaveLoad::saveFilePath = "save.txt"

The file path for the current area to be loaded if this filepath is changed then it becomes the the filepath of the next area/textfile to be loaded
